frameDefinitions: An individual or group, the Rebel, rejects the authority of the Current_leadership, and attempts to bring them out of power.
A Combatant is declared or loyal to a Side in a military Conflict.
A Cognizer has a relatively fixed positive or negative point of view towards an Issue.
A Theme moves with respect to a Fixed_location, generally with a certain Periodicity, without undergoing unbounded translational motion or significant alteration of configuration/shape.
Based on how many Individuals are employed, the Individuals as a whole are described with a Value (either a percentage or absolute number) representing the Employment of the Individuals.
A Terrorist commits a violent or otherwise harmful Act upon a Victim in order to coerce or terrorize a government or populace.
frameExamples: In 1641 there was a Catholic <t>rebellion</t> against the Protestants of Ulster, and English authority over the island was shaken.
A 20-year=old Argentinian <t>guerilla</t> was firing at our squad.
In interviews , it seems like everyone is completely <t>against</t> this expenditure .
<t>Unemployment</t> is down, salaries are up for US chemists.
Their <t>terrorism</t> against civilians will not be tolerated.
listRoleDefinitions: The individual or group within a society that attempts to overturn the <fen>Current_leadership</fen>, and possibly also the <fen>Current_order</fen> of governance.
The people currently in power, whom the <fen>Rebel</fen>s attempt to overthrow.
The currently-existing system of authority or government.
The time when the rebellion takes place.
The location of the rebellion.
The <fen>Combatant</fen> is the human being involved in combat.
The individual that holds an opinion on an <fen>Issue</fen> or Side.
The matter, usually concerning a course of action, which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has a positive or negative opinion about.
The party or individual (generally associated with a particular position on an <fen>Issue</fen>) that the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has an opinion about.
An action taken by a <fen>Side</fen> or a view that the <fen>Side</fen> takes on an issue which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> either supports or opposes.
The time period during which the <fen>Cognizer</fen> has the indicated point of view towards the <fen>Issue</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Cognizer</fen> takes <fen>Side</fen>s on an <fen>Issue</fen> .
A physical entity that is participating in non-translational motion.
The time at which the <fen>Theme</fen> is in bounded motion.
The location where the bounded motion happens.
The group of people whose employment status is considered.
The property of a group of <fen>Individuals</fen> describing how many of them are employed or unemployed.
The count or percentage of people among the group of <fen>Individuals</fen> that are of the specified employment status.
A modifier expressing  the deviation of the <fen>Value</fen> from the norm.
The <fen>Time</fen> during which <fen>Employment</fen> level of the <fen>Individuals</fen> has a specified <fen>Value</fen>.
The location where the <fen>Individuals</fen> under consideration reside.
The <fen>Terrorist</fen> commits the <fen>Act</fen> of terror for political or ideological gains.
The <fen>Act</fen> is the harmful action performed by the <fen>Terrorist</fen> or terrorist organization.
The <fen>Victim</fen> is most directly affected or harmed by the <fen>Act</fen> of terrorism.
The location in time when the <fen>Act</fen> takes place.
The location where the <fen>Act</fen> takes place.
listRoleExamples: In 1641 there was a <fex>Catholic</fex> rebellion against the Protestants of Ulster, and English authority over the island was shaken.
It was the first time that a man of such high rank had been put to death for rebellion <fex>against the king</fex>.
At the time they were in rebellion <fex>against the Catholic government</fex>.
It seems probably that rebellion <fex>in East Anglia</fex> was as rigorously suppressed as in Kent.
<fex>Last year</fex> she opposed the bill, but changed her mind after she received correspondence supporting the bill.
The high unemployment <fex>of the Romany population</fex> is one of the key issues, which need addressing.
The statistics are shocking: <fex><t>unemployment</t></fex> is 57 per cent.
While current unemployment <fex>of about 6%</fex> isn't high by historical standards, there's no denying this trend toward job exportation.
This leads to <fex>high</fex> joblessness in some pockets.
<fex>Last month's</fex> unemployment was 5.17 percent on a seasonally-adjusted basis.

A stadium is expected to cost $350 million, and financial woes caused by recession
and high joblessness <fex>in Oregon</fex> all but rule out public financing.
Several domestic <fex>terrorists</fex> were operating from the site during the mid 1990s.
Many have suffered due to their acts of <fex><t>terrorism</t></fex>.
Cowardly acts of terrorism <fex>upon innocent men, women, and children</fex> is not a doorway to Heaven, but a gateway to Hell.
